pageTitle: Need for Speed Rivals, Cheapest Price & Best Deal
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {15780=If you feel the need... the need for speed, Rivals just dropped to $16 at GameFly. It's the lowest price ever since its November release and 60% off the usual $40 list price., 17418=The Nov. 19th release Need for Speed Rivals is already down to $32 on PC. For 24 hours GameFly has the price down from $49.99 to $39.99 instantly, and there's a stacking 20% off coupon knocking it down to $32. Game activates on Origin, though it sells for $49.99 there., 16576=New low on the Need for Speed Rivals PC download over at Amazon. Today they dropped the relatively recent November 19th release down to $22.33, which is 55% off its $49.99 list price. Previous low was $26.25 ($4 more) during the final days of those crazy PC Winter sales.}

textAfterTable: Get price drop email alerts enable JavaScript to view the a href="http://disqus.com/?ref_noscript" powered by Disqus Past Editor’s Notes and Discussions Mike Paddock Mar 04, 2014 when the price was $39.99 Need for Speed Rivals on the PS4 and Xbox One got a $20 haircut today at Amazon. It's the lowest price by $9 for the next gen consoles. Solid deal when you consider Amazon is selling the PC Download game key (which has very little overhead) for $49.99.
